actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should reduce imports of apparel so that imported textiles comprise no more that 25 percent of the American apparel market.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should reduce imports of apparel to no more than 25 percent of the American apparel market.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should reduce imports of apparel so that imported textiles comprise no more that 25 percent of the American apparel market.
